channel.title: CVE Feed for openSUSE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for openSUSE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2013-3703|2024-08-06T16:14:56.837Z -- opensuse -- open%20build%20service
item.description: The controller of the Open Build Service API prior to version 2.4.4 is missing a write permission check, allowing an authenticated attacker to add or remove user roles from packages and/or project meta data.

item.title: CVE-2014-0593|2024-08-06T09:20:19.687Z -- opensuse -- obs-service-set_version
item.description: The set_version script as shipped with obs-service-set_version is a source validator for the Open Build Service (OBS). In versions prior to 0.5.3-1.1 this script did not properly sanitize the input provided by the user, allowing for code execution on the executing server.

item.title: CVE-2014-0594|2024-08-06T09:20:19.837Z -- opensuse -- open%20build%20service
item.description: In the Open Build Service (OBS) before version 2.4.6 the CSRF protection is incorrectly disabled in the web interface, allowing for requests without the user's consent.
